name: 2nd-Order Sallen-Key High-Pass Filter
description: Active second-order Sallen-Key high-pass filter using a unity-gain opamp buffer. Provides -40 dB/decade rolloff below the cutoff with Butterworth response when component values are chosen appropriately.
design_equations: f_c = 1 / (2 * pi * sqrt(R1 * R2 * C1 * C2))
netlist:
* 2nd-Order Sallen-Key High-Pass Filter
.param R1=10k
.param R2=10k
.param C1=20n
.param C2=10n
.subckt ideal_opamp inp inn out
E1 out 0 inp inn 100k
.ends ideal_opamp
V1 in 0 dc 0 ac 1
C1 in n1 {C1}
C2 n1 n2 {C2}
R1 n1 out {R1}
R2 n2 0 {R2}
X1 out n2 out ideal_opamp
